Instance Method# getUsage

DriverKit 19.0+macOS

```
uint32_t getUsage();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/hiddriverkit/iohidelement/getusage#return-value)

Returns the element’s usage. Usages are defined in [HID Usage Tables](/documentation/hiddriverkit/hid-usage-tables).
